backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing chat sessions, user profiles, permissions, and generating Puro responses with action parsing.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking an avatar update request to the PuroAvatar component and related packages.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including chat components, layout, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and dark mode overrides for global theming.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the main React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component controlling authentication, profile setup gating, and rendering the chat interface.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message input with textarea, Enter-to-send behavior, and action message indicator.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatTranscr: Renders chat history or an empty-state prompt when no messages exist.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Displays chat messages with styling differences for Puro vs user and action vs dialogue.
Avatar component showing the Puro image in various sizes with circular styling.
frontend/src/components/layout/ChatLayou: Layout wrapper providing header with Puro branding, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal prompting users to enter their display name before accessing chat, with save handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout methods, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and chat messages through the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with custom color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat UI, loading history, sending messages, handling errors, and auto‑scrolling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, containers, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata and features for an AI chat app that roleplays as Puro, including UI requirements, avatar assets, and action-parsing behavior.
